course_title: Special Topics: Literature: Leo Tolstoy In Eng.Translation
class_notes:
(Same as RUSS 375W 1, IDS 385W 4)


Examines the thought and art of one of Russia's most influential writers. In works such as War and Peace and Anna Karenina, Tolstoy offers insight into issues still fundamental to us today: the meaning of life and death, moral and social responsibility, and personal identity.
course_description: Lively topical or theoretical approaches to a given set of literary texts or problems. May be repeated for credit when subject varies..
sections: Class Nbr: 4721, Section #: 2, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 11:20a-12:35p, Instructor: V. Proskurina, Status: Open
